title: Senior Bowl Week Recap, Evaluating Justin Herbert, Jordan Love & Jalen Hurts, Risers & Fallers (Football 1/24)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson to recap Senior Bowl week from Mobile, Alabama. The guys discuss how teams and scouts approach the week and game (4:45), as well as the performances from Justin Herbert (6:20), Jordan Love (16:15), Jalen Hurts and other quarterbacks over the past couple days (23:00). Will and Ryan also analyze risers (35:00) & fallers from the week, observations of the Lions and Bengals coaching staffs (39:00) and what to watch during the actual game on Saturday.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
